pageProps.title: Working On-Site vs Working Remotely in India: A Comparison of Job Opportunities and Pay Scale
pageProps.metaDesc:
The past two years have brought a shift in the way we work and interact with our colleagues. Remote work has become the new normal, and many companies are opting for a distributed workforce to cut costs and gain access to a wider pool of talent. However, the remote work trend is not yet prevalent in India, and on-site jobs still dominate the job market.
In this article, we will compare the job opportunities and pay scales for working on-site versus working remotely in India.
